summary_detail.value: Beginning September 3, 2017, the emergency closure area boundary includes all National Forest Service Lands, Roads and trails off Highway 200 on the Lincoln Ranger District.

title: Emergency Order: Area Closure boundary expanded As of September 3 (Park Creek Fire Wildfire)
